rmimessenger.general.commands

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • rmimessenger.general.commands.Command
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptFriendCommand, CancelFriendCommand, FindUserCommand, GetUserInfoCommand, LoginCommand, LogOutCommand, RegisterCommand, RejectFriendCommand, RequestFriendCommand, SendMessageCommand, StopCommand, UnregisterCommand

    public abstract class Command
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Das Command wird vom Client zum Server gesendet und dort via execute ausgefuehrt.
